name: Imp (itch) (Andy Miller)
description:
A short game about sneaking, demon possession, and exploding bodies.

Features
  • Possess unsuspecting guards!
  • Dash through lasers!
  • Zip through vents!
  • Take control of a mega-corporation!
Controls
  • Move with the ARROW KEYS
  • Dash and possess with SPACE
  • Interact with A
